EDGECLIFF VILLAGE CITY COUNCIL MEETING AGENDA

1/3

Next

[Download PDF](//img1.wsimg.com/blobby/go/49312170-715c-46ac-adf7-429542be2f6e/FireChief%20Interviews.pdf)

known issue when viewing online agenda
--------------------------------------

#### Current Work Around To View Agendas

City Hall is aware of an issue with being able to view the online agenda. It is currently being worked on to fix this issue. 

**There is a Temporary fix:**

- Select the agenda you would like to view.

- Once the link is shown, right click the link and select "open link in new tab"

The agenda will show correctly.
